title: Train Fever (GOG)

Train Fever includes the original game plus the FREE USA DLC!

Train Fever is a railroad-focused business simulation game. In other words, it's a modern-day Transport Tycoon with procedural content and a sophisticated city simulation.

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the year 1850, and there are great times ahead! Establish a transport company and be its manager. Build infrastructure such as railways and stations, purchase transportation vehicles and manage lines. Fulfill the peopleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s needs and watch cities evolve dynamically.

Train Fever runs on an engine specifically developed for this game. The engine has a great innovative scope and is specialized in procedural content and urban simulation. A key point is the fact that there is no grid that game objects have to be aligned to, allowing for a great degree of freedom.


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Randomly generated, modifiable terrain with realistic dimensions

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Advanced passenger simulation

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Dynamically simulated urban development

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Procedurally generated buildings

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢No grid - that is, the game world is not limited to 90 (or 45) degree angles

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Vehicles from more than 150 years of transportation history

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Passenger and freight transport

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Detailed 3D graphics

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Freely adjustable zoom factor

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Complete USA game mode (equivalent to European game mode)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢More than 50 realistic and detailed American vehicles

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Trains, buses, streetcars and trucks of more than 150 years of American history

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢American landscape, towns, streets and environment

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢In-game mod support (enable game modifications in-game)
